tooltip.hexalia.ghostveil: Shrouds the wearer to avoid mob detection
tooltip.hexalia.mandrake: Stuns in an area on usage
tooltip.hexalia.rabbage: Can be thrown to cause bleeding
tooltip.hexalia.shelf: Can store up to 6 brews or potions
effect.hexalia.bloodlust.description: Increases strength, and restores 25% of the damage dealt to your foes
effect.hexalia.stunned.description: Lock your foes in place, rendering them unable to move.
effect.hexalia.overfed.description: Prevents saturation from lowering but the user can still consume food.
effect.hexalia.slimewalker.description: The user negates fall damage for the duration of the effect. The user bounces unless the sneak key is pressed
effect.hexalia.spikeskin.description: Increases the armor toughness of the user and reflects 20% of damage back to attackers
effect.hexalia.siphon.description: Increases mining speed and the user attracts items in the ground from a 5 block distance
effect.hexalia.bleeding.description: Deals damage each tick similar to the Poison effect.
effect.hexalia.daybloom.description: During the day the player is healed and has increased speed, but darkness hurts the player.
effect.hexalia.arachnid_grace.descriptio: Allows the user to vertically climb up walls and grants poison immunity. Cobwebs won't affect the user.
advancements.hexalia.root.title: Hexalia
advancements.hexalia.root.description: Step into the enchanting world of Hexalia!
advancements.hexalia.mortar_and_pestle.d: Craft a tool to pulverize plants
advancements.hexalia.slimey_brew.title: Bounce Like a Slime
advancements.hexalia.slimey_brew.descrip: Drink the Brew of Slimewalker and receive its effects.
advancements.hexalia.salt_item.title: A Pinch of Salt
advancements.hexalia.salt_item.descripti: Obtain Salt from Saltsprouts or Salt Blocks
advancements.hexalia.purifying_salts.des: Use this item to remove all status effects
advancements.hexalia.stone_dagger.title: Sticky Situation
advancements.hexalia.stone_dagger.descri: Craft an item to gather Resin from certain trees
advancements.hexalia.ritual_table.title: The Witch's Table
advancements.hexalia.ritual_table.descri: Obtain the Ritual Table by right-clicking a Deepslate block
advancements.hexalia.hex_focus.title: Witch Starter Kit
advancements.hexalia.hex_focus.descripti: Get your hands on a Hex Focusâ€”the tool of a true witch.
advancements.hexalia.rabbage.title: Is This Cabbage Biting?
advancements.hexalia.rabbage.description: Obtain a Rabbage, the cabbage that bites your enemies.
advancements.hexalia.weather_idol.title: Weather Whisperer
advancements.hexalia.weather_idol.descri: Use all of the weather idols.
advancements.hexalia.elemental_nodes.des: Obtain all of the elemental nodes.
advancements.hexalia.ritual_brazier.desc: Obtain a Ritual Brazier by right-clicking a planks block while sneaking.
advancements.hexalia.moon_crystal.title: Moonlit Alchemy
advancements.hexalia.moon_crystal.descri: Obtain a Moon Crystal by placing an Amethyst in a Ritual Brazier at night.
advancements.hexalia.daybloom_brew.title: Sun's Favor
advancements.hexalia.daybloom_brew.descr: Drink the Brew of Daybloom and receive its effects.
message.hexalia.ritual.missing_ingredien: The ritual has failed due to missing ingredients.
message.hexalia.ritual.invalid_crops: Natural energy is weak; fully grown crops are missing.
message.hexalia.ritual.missing_salt: The ritual braziers must have salt to perform the ritual.
message.hexalia.rain_idol: The skies darken as rain begins to fall...
message.hexalia.clear_idol: The clouds part, revealing a clear sky...
message.hexalia.storm_idol: The skies roars as thunders begin to clash...
message.hexalia.moonlight_ritual.invalid: No valid item found for a moonlight ritual.
message.hexalia.moonlight_ritual.not_nig: The current moon phase is not correct for the ritual.
message.hexalia.moonlight_ritual.started: The ritual has begun. The item is being imbued with moonlight...
message.hexalia.censer_not_full: The censer must be filled with herbs before lighting!
message.hexalia.invalid_herb_combination: This combination of herbs does not
message.hexalia.censer.fireproof_presenc: A protective warmth radiates from the censer
message.hexalia.censer.undead_veil: Unnatural stillness quiets the restless dead
message.hexalia.censer.livestock_comfort: Animals seem soothed by the herbal aroma
message.hexalia.censer.anvil_harmony: Metals whisper secrets of perfect balance
message.hexalia.censer.fishers_boon: Water spirits dance beneath the surface
message.hexalia.censer.suction_zone: A gentle wind gathers loose objects
message.hexalia.invalid_item: This item is not a valid item for this block.
item.hexalia.verdant_grimoire.landing_te: A well-detailed book is your trusted tool in matters of witchcraft and plant care.
jei.info.wild_sunfire_tomatoes: Sunfire Tomatoes are found in the savanna biome or planted in Barren Huts.
jei.info.wild_mandrakes: Mandrakes are found in the forest biome.
jei.info.saltsprout: Saltsprout can be found planted in Barren Huts.
jei.info.chillberry_bushes: Chillberry Bushes are found in the Taiga biome.
